thread.title: BRIEF-Lasalle Hotel Properties To Review Revised Unsolicited Proposal From Pebblebrook Hotel Trust

title: BRIEF-Lasalle Hotel Properties To Review Revised Unsolicited Proposal From Pebblebrook Hotel Trust
text:
April 16, 2018 / 11:36 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Lasalle Hotel Properties To Review Revised Unsolicited Proposal From Pebblebrook Hotel Trust Reuters Staff 
April 16 (Reuters) - LaSalle Hotel Properties: 
* LASALLE HOTEL PROPERTIES TO REVIEW REVISED UNSOLICITED PROPOSAL FROM PEBBLEBROOK HOTEL TRUST 
* LASALLE HOTEL PROPERTIES - CONFIRMED THAT IT RECEIVED A REVISED UNSOLICITED PROPOSAL FROM PEBBLEBROOK HOTEL TRUST Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
